Package <Unnamed>

Class HexagonFractal extends javax.swing.JApplet implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 1L

Serialized Fields

textControlsPane

javax.swing.JPanel textControlsPane
A panel to contain the preference menu.

textDimension

javax.swing.JTextField textDimension
Hexagon dimension text field

textLevel

javax.swing.JTextField textLevel
Fractal level text field

javax.swing.JComboBox drawmodeBox
Draw mode combination box

javax.swing.JComboBox drawobjectBox

javax.swing.JComboBox drawcolorBox

Class HexPaint extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 1L

Serialized Fields

level

int level
Fractal level the user selected

dimension

int dimension
Dimension of the hexagon the user selected (in pixels). This is also the diameter of the circle the hexagon can fit into.

DSIN60

double DSIN60
Calculated value of sin(60 degrees) - the 60 degrees needs to be converted to radians. This value is used throughout the class to calculate the width of a hexagon.

drawmode

int drawmode
Draw mode the user selected.
  • 0 = Use Graphics class (default)
  • 1 = Use Graphics2D class
  • 2 = Use both classes (draw twice

drawobject

int drawobject
Draw object the user selected.
  • 0 = Hexagon (default)
  • 1 = Circle
  • 2 = Both, hexagon and circle

drawcolor

int drawcolor
Draw color setting the user selected.
  • 0 = Black outline only (default)
  • 1 = Color each level
  • 2 = Color each level plus outline in black

color

java.awt.Color[] color
Array of colors used to define the fractal level. The color to be selected is determined by the color element at the specified fractal level. The code will reuse colors if there is more fractal levels than colors.
